page.title: 19ALRESFORD SCHOOL APPEAL
page.content: In 1981 {Perin's School Appeal {Trust Fund (PAT) }was set up. Its aim to initially raise #20,000. This has been well exceeded over the years since, and the school has used the funds to help bolster the dwindling educational resources. The school was able to buy 10 microcomputers and other necessary hardware. Other departments bought their own micros., some had a video recorder. The drama department is able to hire professional performers, in fact every department has benefitted. One of the big changes apart from the introduction of Computer Studies and an Awareness Course has been the modernisation of the Business Studies Department. It now has six word processing work stations. The most recent purchase is the new school minibus to replace the old one.
